Klasse WorldGenerator

java.lang.Object
game.WorldGenerator
public class WorldGenerator extends Object
The WorldGenerator class is responsible for generating and manipulating the map.

  • Konstruktorübersicht

    Konstruktoren
    Konstruktor
    Beschreibung
    WorldGenerator(int sizeX, int sizeY)
    The Constructor for WorldGenerator.
    It takes the size of the map as an input and pre generates a little area.

  • Methodenübersicht

    Modifizierer und Typ
    Methode
    Beschreibung
    void
    deleteBuilding(int posX, int posY)
    Removes the building on one specified tile.
    void
    generateTile(int posX, int posY)
    This method generates a specified tile (Field object of the map) and then collapses the wave according to very simple rules (generates other tiles that should only have one value).
    Field
    getField(int posX, int posY)
    Returns a Field specified by its coordinates.
    int
    getXLengthMap()
    Returns the width of the map.
    int
    getYLengthMap()
    Returns the height of the map.

    Sets the building of one specified tile.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • WorldGenerator

      public WorldGenerator(int sizeX, int sizeY)
      The Constructor for WorldGenerator.
      It takes the size of the map as an input and pre generates a little area.
      Parameter:
      sizeX - The number of tiles in the x dimension.
      sizeY - The number of tiles in the y dimension.

  • Methodendetails

    • generateTile

      public void generateTile(int posX, int posY)
      This method generates a specified tile (Field object of the map) and then collapses the wave according to very simple rules (generates other tiles that should only have one value).
      Parameter:
      posX - The x coordinate of the tile to be generated.
      posY - The y coordinate of the tile to be generated.

    • getField

      public Field getField(int posX, int posY)
      Returns a Field specified by its coordinates.
      Parameter:
      posX - The x coordinate of the tile.
      posY - The y coordinate of the tile.
      Gibt zurück:
      The Field object of the tile.

    • getXLengthMap

      public int getXLengthMap()
      Returns the width of the map.
      Gibt zurück:
      The width.

    • getYLengthMap

      public int getYLengthMap()
      Returns the height of the map.
      Gibt zurück:
      The height.

    • placeBuilding

      public void placeBuilding(int posX, int posY, Building b)
      Sets the building of one specified tile.
      Parameter:
      posX - The x coordinate of the tile.
      posY - The y coordinate of the tile.
      b - The Building to be placed on the tile.

    • deleteBuilding

      public void deleteBuilding(int posX, int posY)
      Removes the building on one specified tile.
      Parameter:
      posX - The x coordinate of the tile.
      posY - The y coordinate of the tile.
